name: Intergalactic Space VR Roller Coaster
description:
Welcome to Intergalactic Space Virtual Reality Roller Coaster - the most exciting VR Roller Coaster ever! Take a ride on the fastest and most thrilling roller coaster and enjoy a virtual reality experience like never before!

Explore the planets of this special universe in a new and fun way while you swoosh by at high speed and perform loops and tight turns!

Have fun!

A game developed and published by The Lonely Developer
